languages.text: Невообразимое богатство в виде десятины Простора стало залогом абсолютной власти Вольного Торговца. Армии наемников были готовы лобызать ноги обладател{mf|ю|ьнице} несметных сокровищ, архитекторы возводили дворцы в {mf|его|ее} честь, и самые ценные артефакты торговцы предпочитали сбывать на Даргонусе. Темная роскошь лилась рекой в резиденции {mf|того|той}, чьей жадности улыбались Темные Боги, а пиры и жертвоприношения не останавливались ни на миг. Торговля в других мирах была обескровлена, и прочим династиям оставалось лишь преклонить колено или выродиться, ибо Простор отныне принадлежал одному человеку.
languages.translation_comment:
Всю десятину забрали себе
еретик или забрали десятину и доминирует еретик соулмарка

Всю десятину забрали себе
еретик или забрали десятину и доминирует еретик соулмарка

languages.text: The unimaginable wealth that was the Koronus Expanse's tithe became the foundation of the Rogue Trader's absolute power. Mercenary armies were prepared to kiss the feet of the owner of such immense treasure. Architects erected palaces in {mf|his|her} honour. Traders preferred Dargonus as the place to sell their most valuable artefacts. Sinister opulence flowed into the residences of {mf|him|her} whose greed the dark gods smiled upon. The feasts and the sacrifices never ceased for a moment. Trade elsewhere was gutted, and other dynasties had no choice but to either bend the knee or decline and disappear, for the Expanse now belonged to one person alone.
languages.original_text: Невообразимое богатство в виде десятины Простора стало залогом абсолютной власти Вольного Торговца. Армии наемников были готовы лобызать ноги обладател{mf|ю|ьнице} несметных сокровищ, архитекторы возводили дворцы в {mf|его|ее} честь, и самые ценные артефакты торговцы предпочитали сбывать на Даргонусе. Темная роскошь лилась рекой в резиденции {mf|того|той}, чьей жадности улыбались Темные Боги, а пиры и жертвоприношения не останавливались ни на миг. Торговля в других мирах была обескровлена, и прочим династиям оставалось лишь преклонить колено или выродиться, ибо Простор отныне принадлежал одному человеку.

Traders preferred Dargonus as the place to sell their most valuable artifacts. Sinister opulence flowed into the residences of {mf|him|her} whose greed the Dark Gods smiled at. The feasts and the sacrifices never ceased for a moment. Trade elsewhere was gutted, and other dynasties had no choice but to either bend the knee or decline and disappear, for the Expanse now belonged to one person alone.

languages.text: Der unvorstellbare Reichtum durch den Zehnt der Koronus-Ausdehnung wurde zum Grundstein der absoluten Macht {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Söldnerarmeen waren bereit, {mf|dem Besitzer|der Besitzerin} solcher Schätze die Füße zu küssen. Architekten errichteten Paläste zu {mf|seinen|ihren} Ehren. Händler erklärten Dargonus zum bevorzugtem Handelsplatz für ihre wertvollsten Artefakte. Unheimliche Opulenz herrschte in {mf|seinen|ihren} Residenzen, und die dunklen Götter lächelten auf {mf|seine|ihre} Gier herab. Keinen Augenblick brachen die Festmahle und Opferrituale ab. Andernorts gab es keinen Handel mehr, und die übrigen Dynastien mussten entweder auf die Knie fallen oder sich verweigern und untergehen, denn die Ausdehnung gehörte jetzt ganz allein einer Person.
languages.original_text: The unimaginable wealth that was the Koronus Expanse's tithe became the foundation of the Rogue Trader's absolute power. The feasts and the sacrifices never ceased for a moment. Trade elsewhere was gutted, and other dynasties had no choice but to either bend the knee or decline and disappear, for the Expanse now belonged to one person alone.

traits.locale_text: Der unvorstellbare Reichtum durch den Zehnt der Koronus-Ausdehnung wurde zum Grundstein der absoluten Macht {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Söldnerarmeen waren bereit, {mf|dem Besitzer|der Besitzerin} solcher Schätze die Füße zu küssen. Architekten errichteten Paläste zu {mf|seinen|ihren} Ehren. Händler erklärten Dargonus zum bevorzugtem Handelsplatz für ihre wertvollsten Artefakte. Unheimliche Opulenz herrschte in {mf|seinen|ihren} Residenzen, und die dunklen Götter lächelten auf {mf|seine|ihre} Gier herab. Keinen Augenblick brachen die Festmahle und Opferrituale ab. Andernorts gab es keinen Handel mehr, und die übrigen Dynastien mussten entweder auf die Knie fallen oder sich verweigern und untergehen, denn die Ausdehnung gehörte jetzt ganz allein einer Person.

languages.text: La richesse inimaginable que constituait la dîme des Étendues de Koronus devint la fondation même du pouvoir absolu {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Toutes les armées de mercenaires étaient prêtes à lui baiser les pieds. Des architectes érigèrent des palais en son honneur. Les marchands se pliaient en quatre pour vendre leurs artefacts les plus précieux sur Dargonus. Les résidences {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} suintaient d'une opulence si sinistre qu'une telle cupidité ne pouvait que lui attirer les faveurs des Dieux Sombres. Les festins et les sacrifices ne connaissaient pas de répit. Le commerce n'avait plus lieu nulle part ailleurs. Les autres dynasties n'eurent d'autre choix que de se soumettre ou de disparaître, car les Étendues tout entières n'appartenaient plus qu'à une seule personne.
languages.original_text: The unimaginable wealth that was the Koronus Expanse's tithe became the foundation of the Rogue Trader's absolute power. Mercenary armies were prepared to kiss the feet of the owner of such immense treasure. Architects erected palaces in {mf|his|her} honour. Traders preferred Dargonus as the place to sell their most valuable artefacts. Sinister opulence flowed into the residences of {mf|him|her} whose greed the dark gods smiled upon. The feasts and the sacrifices never ceased for a moment. Trade elsewhere was gutted, and other dynasties had no choice but to either bend the knee or decline and disappear, for the Expanse now belonged to one person alone.

languages.text: 科罗努斯扩区的什一税带来了难以想象的财富，为行商浪人至高无上的权力奠定了基石。雇佣兵们迫不及待地赶来，打算随时亲吻尊贵之人的双脚；建筑师为了纪念这位伟人，建造起了高耸入云的宫殿；众多商人涌入了达戈努斯，在这里交易最珍贵的商品。邪恶的财富流入了行商浪人的宝库，而黑暗诸神对{mf|他|她}的贪婪青睐有加。宴会与祭祀一刻不曾停止，其他区域的贸易遭到了破坏，其余王朝别无选择，要么拱手而降，要么就此陨落。如今，科罗努斯扩区只剩下了一位主宰。
languages.original_text: The unimaginable wealth that was the Koronus Expanse's tithe became the foundation of the Rogue Trader's absolute power. Mercenary armies were prepared to kiss the feet of the owner of such immense treasure. Architects erected palaces in {mf|his|her} honour. Traders preferred Dargonus as the place to sell their most valuable artefacts. Sinister opulence flowed into the residences of {mf|him|her} whose greed the dark gods smiled upon. The feasts and the sacrifices never ceased for a moment. Trade elsewhere was gutted, and other dynasties had no choice but to either bend the knee or decline and disappear, for the Expanse now belonged to one person alone.

科罗努斯扩区的什一税带来了难以想象的财富，为行商浪人至高无上的权力奠定了基石。雇佣兵们迫不及待地赶来，打算随时亲吻尊贵之人的双脚；建筑师为了纪念这位伟人，建造起了高耸入云的宫殿；众多商人涌入了达戈努斯，在这里交易最珍贵的商品。邪恶的财富流入了行商浪人的宝库，而黑暗诸神对{mf|他|她}的贪婪青睐有加。宴会与祭祀一刻不曾停止，其他区域的贸易遭到了破坏，其余王朝别无选择，要么拱手而降，要么就此陨落。如今，科罗努斯扩区只剩下了一位主宰。

languages.text: La riqueza inimaginable del diezmo de la Extensión de Koronus sentó los cimientos del poder absoluto de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Los ejércitos mercenarios estaban preparados para besar los pies de{mf|l| la} dueñ{mf|o|a} de un tesoro tan inmenso. Los arquitectos construían palacios en su honor. Los mercaderes optaban por Dargonus para vender sus artefactos más valiosos. Una siniestra opulencia fluyó hacia las mansiones de {mf|aquel|aquella} cuya codicia hacía sonreír a los Dioses Oscuros. Los banquetes y sacrificios no cesaban en ningún momento. El comercio de otras regiones quedó destrozado, y las otras dinastías no tuvieron más opción que arrodillarse ante {mf|él|ella} o quedar condenadas al olvido, pues la Extensión pertenecía ahora a una sola persona.
languages.original_text: The unimaginable wealth that was the Koronus Expanse's tithe became the foundation of the Rogue Trader's absolute power. Mercenary armies were prepared to kiss the feet of the owner of such immense treasure. Architects erected palaces in {mf|his|her} honour. Traders preferred Dargonus as the place to sell their most valuable artefacts. Sinister opulence flowed into the residences of {mf|him|her} whose greed the dark gods smiled upon. The feasts and the sacrifices never ceased for a moment. Trade elsewhere was gutted, and other dynasties had no choice but to either bend the knee or decline and disappear, for the Expanse now belonged to one person alone.

languages.text: コロヌス・エクスパンスから徴収された租税という想像を絶する富は、ローグトレーダーの絶対的な権力の礎となった。その莫大な財宝の持ち主に対しては、傭兵軍でさえも足に口づけする覚悟で仕えようとした。建築家たちはその栄光を讃えて宮殿を築き、交易商たちは最も貴重な遺物を売る場所としてダルゴナスを選んだ。邪悪なほどの贅沢が、貪欲さゆえに暗黒神がほほえむ者たちの邸宅へと流れ込んだ。饗宴と生贄は片時も止むことがなかった。他の地域の交易は干上がり、他の王朝は膝を屈するか、衰退して消え去るかの二択を迫られた。なぜなら、もはやこのエクスパンスはただ一人の者のものとなったからである。
languages.original_text: The unimaginable wealth that was the Koronus Expanse's tithe became the foundation of the Rogue Trader's absolute power. Mercenary armies were prepared to kiss the feet of the owner of such immense treasure. Architects erected palaces in {mf|his|her} honour. Traders preferred Dargonus as the place to sell their most valuable artefacts. Sinister opulence flowed into the residences of {mf|him|her} whose greed the dark gods smiled upon. The feasts and the sacrifices never ceased for a moment. Trade elsewhere was gutted, and other dynasties had no choice but to either bend the knee or decline and disappear, for the Expanse now belonged to one person alone.

languages.text: Koronus Enginliği'nin akıl almaz serveti aşar, Hür Tacir'in mutlak gücünün temeli oldu. Paralı asker orduları, böylesine devasa bir hazinenin sahibinin ayaklarını öpmeye hazırdı. Mimarlar onun şerefine saraylar dikti. Tüccarlar, en değerli eserlerini satmak için özellikle Dargonus'a geldi. Karanlık tanrıların açgözlülüğüne gülümseyerek baktığı kişinin meskenlerine uğursuz bir zenginlik aktı. Ziyafetlerin ve kurbanların olmadığı bir an bile yoktu. Başka yerlerdeki ticaret sekteye uğradı ve diğer hanedanlıkların ya diz çöküp biat etmekten ya da zayıflayıp yok olmaktan başka çaresi kalmadı. Zira Enginlik, artık tek bir kişiye aitti.
languages.original_text: The unimaginable wealth that was the Koronus Expanse's tithe became the foundation of the Rogue Trader's absolute power. Mercenary armies were prepared to kiss the feet of the owner of such immense treasure. Architects erected palaces in {mf|his|her} honour. Traders preferred Dargonus as the place to sell their most valuable artefacts. Sinister opulence flowed into the residences of {mf|him|her} whose greed the dark gods smiled upon. The feasts and the sacrifices never ceased for a moment. Trade elsewhere was gutted, and other dynasties had no choice but to either bend the knee or decline and disappear, for the Expanse now belonged to one person alone.
